\def\xaxisstart{-0.25}
\def\xaxisend{2}

\newcommand{\cylinder}{
    \begin{tikzpicture}[domain=0:2.5, samples=200, scale=1]
    
        % x-axis
        \draw[->, gray, line width=1pt] (\xaxisstart,0) -- (\xaxisend,0) node[right, gray] {$x$};

        % cylinder
        \draw[black] (0.25,0) arc (180:360:0.5 and 0.15);
        \draw[black] [dashed] (0.25,0) arc (180:360:0.5 and -0.15);
        \draw[black] (0.75,1.25) ellipse (0.5 and 0.15);
        \draw[black] (0.25,0) -- (0.25,1.25);
        \draw[black] (1.25,0) -- (1.25,1.25);

        \fill[gray, fill opacity=0.5] (0.25,0) -- (0.25,1.25) arc (180:360:0.5 and 0.15) -- (1.25,0) arc (0:180:0.5 and -0.15);

        % yeah, this is smehow necessary
        \draw[color=white, fill=white] (0.75,-1) circle (0.0125) node[above, darkgray] {sample};
    \end{tikzpicture}
}


\newcommand{\phase}{

\newcommand{\ddphasecontrast}{
    \begin{tikzpicture}[domain=0:2.5, samples=200, scale=1]
    
        % x-axis
        \draw[->, white, line width=1pt] (\xaxisstart,0) -- (\xaxisend,0) node[right, white] {$x$};
        
        \draw [draw=black!50, fill=black!50] (0, -0.25) rectangle (0.249, 0.25);
